sentences.en: " We'll have to take the train. It's the quickest way. "
sentences.cn: " 我们得乘火车去, 这样最快.

sentences.en: A telegram will be the quickest way to transmit the message.
sentences.cn: 打电报将是传递这个信息的最快途径.

sentences.en: Giving advice when it's not called for is the quickest way to end a good friendship.
sentences.cn: 在别人不需要的时候提供建议是葬送好友关系的最快方式。

sentences.en: Having children was the quickest way to lose your street cred.
sentences.cn: 生孩子是使自己不再年轻时尚的最快方法。

sentences.en: His temper is of the quickest.
However, in some instances it is the quickest way to achieve a goal.
sentences.cn: 但是，在有些情况下这是达到目标最快的一种方式。

sentences.en: I know T / T is the quickest way and the commission is higher.
sentences.cn: 我知道电汇是最快捷的方法,但手续费较高.

sentences.en: It was the quickest swimming lesson I'd ever witnessed.
sentences.cn: 这是我所见过的最速成的游泳课。

sentences.en: It's quickest to walk across the field going round by road takes much longer.
sentences.cn: 穿过田地路途最近--绕行公路要远得多.

sentences.en: Probably the quickest and cheapest way from here would be a Fifth Avenue bus.
sentences.cn: 可能从这走最快最省钱的方法是乘坐第五大道公共汽车.

sentences.en: Subways are the quickest way to travel longer distances.
sentences.cn: 到比较远的地方去,最快的办法是乘坐地铁.

sentences.en: The quickest means of travel is by plane.
sentences.cn: 最快的旅行途径是乘飞机.

sentences.en: The quickest way to get her off the drug was to let her go cold turkey.
sentences.cn: 要使她摆脱毒品，最快的方法是让她彻底戒毒。

sentences.en: They have to learn not only the streets, landmarks and hotels, but also the quickest way to get there.
sentences.cn: 他们必须学习不仅是街道，建筑物及酒店，而且最快的方式到达那里。

sentences.en: What would be the quickest way?

trans.tran_cn: 聪明的( quick的最高级 )，快的，灵活的，短时间做成的
